intro: Polygala chinensis var. orbicularis, commonly known as the orbicular polygala, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Polygalaceae and is characterized by its distinctive, orbicular-shaped leaves. The plant produces small, delicate flowers that are typically arranged in racemose inflorescences. It thrives in well-drained soil and partial shade, making it a suitable candidate for rock gardens or woodland settings. Due to its ornamental value, it is occasionally cultivated for horticultural purposes.
